argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_fnfun | |- ( F Fn A -> Fun F ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fdmrn | |- ( Fun F <-> F : dom F --> ran F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylib | |- ( F Fn A -> F : dom F --> ran F ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> F : dom F --> ran F ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( F Fn A -> dom F = A ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> dom F = A ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-rn | |- ran F = dom `' F |
| 8 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( `' F = F -> dom `' F = dom F ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( `' F = F -> ran F = dom F ) |
| 10 | 9, 5 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> ran F = A ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_feq23d | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> ( F : dom F --> ran F <-> F : A --> A ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> F : A --> A ) |
| 13 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> Fun F ) |
| 14 |  | #P_funeq | |- ( `' F = F -> ( Fun `' F <-> Fun F ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> ( Fun `' F <-> Fun F ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> Fun `' F ) |
| 17 |  | #P_df-f1 | |- ( F : A -1-1-> A <-> ( F : A --> A /\ Fun `' F ) ) |
| 18 | 12, 16, 17 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> F : A -1-1-> A ) |
| 19 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> F Fn A ) |
| 20 |  | #P_df-fo | |- ( F : A -onto-> A <-> ( F Fn A /\ ran F = A ) ) |
| 21 | 19, 10, 20 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> F : A -onto-> A ) |
| 22 |  | #P_df-f1o | |- ( F : A -1-1-onto-> A <-> ( F : A -1-1-> A /\ F : A -onto-> A ) ) |
| 23 | 18, 21, 22 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ `' F = F ) -> F : A -1-1-onto-> A ) |
